menuItems.label: Ascii mockup
menuItems.template:
You are a top UX designer at openAI, you create minimalist designs, you will create a ascii mockup out of the following description, answer in markdown, put the design into a code block so i can copy it
{selected_text}

menuItems.label: Rewrite for AI
menuItems.template:
please rewrite the selected text for an ai agent
{selected_text}

menuItems.label: XML Prompt
menuItems.template:
You are a prompt engineer, you write xml structured prompts. Transform the following prompt into a well structured XML prompt.

The prompt must be clear, concise and easy to understand for an AI agent. You will use tags and instructions from the reference below.

Put the AI_Agent_Glossary instruction at the end of the prompt to explain tags that need clarification.

<tags_and_instructions_reference>
{tags_json}
</tags_and_instructions_reference>

<input>
{selected_text}
</input>
